mapper.update: UPDATE DAILY SET OLDESSET = #{oldesset}, NEWESSET = #{newesset}, YIELD = ((#{newesset}/#{oldesset})-1)*100 WHERE ACNTNO = #{acntno}
UPDATE ACCUMULATIVE SET OLDESSET = #{oldesset}, NEWESSET = #{newesset}, YIELD = ((#{newesset}/#{oldesset})-1)*100 WHERE ACNTNO = #{acntno}
UPDATE WEEKLY SET OLDESSET = #{oldesset}, NEWESSET = #{newesset}, YIELD = ((#{newesset}/#{oldesset})-1)*100 WHERE ACNTNO = #{acntno}
UPDATE MONTHLY SET OLDESSET = #{oldesset}, NEWESSET = #{newesset}, YIELD = ((#{newesset}/#{oldesset})-1)*100 WHERE ACNTNO = #{acntno}
